direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve form-related objects based on locale-specific keys.
Both methods handle locale-based form retrieval with similar control flows and parameter handling.
The getForm method relies on form sets added by addFormSet, making it a direct dependency.
Both methods access and process form-related resources, albeit at different stages.
Both methods handle potential null returns and log warnings or errors similarly.
The getForm method with a single string parameter can be substituted with the Locale-based getForm method in certain contexts.
Both methods access form sets, which are central to the functionality of the getForm method.
Both methods construct locale-based keys, which are crucial for form retrieval.
Both methods involve hierarchical retrieval of form-related objects, though for different purposes.
Both methods involve initialization and configuration of resources, though for different functionalities.
